languages.text: Предназначен для проведения церемоний Экклезиархии. Не добрался до адресата.
This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.
languages.original_text: Предназначен для проведения церемоний Экклезиархии. Не добрался до адресата.

traits.locale_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

languages.text: Esta arma ceremonial debía usarse en rituales de la Eclesiarquía. Nunca llegó a su destino.
languages.original_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma ceremonial debía usarse en rituales de la Eclesiarquía. Nunca llegó a su destino.

languages.text: 这把武器本该在国教仪式上使用，但它并没有被运达指定的收件人手中。
languages.original_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器本该在国教仪式上使用，但它并没有被运达指定的收件人手中。

languages.text: この武器は、帝国聖教会の式典で使用されるはずだった。その目的の相手には届かなかった。
languages.original_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

traits.locale_text: この武器は、帝国聖教会の式典で使用されるはずだった。その目的の相手には届かなかった。

languages.text: Diese Waffe war für Zeremonien der Ekklesiarchie gedacht. Sie hat ihren Empfänger nie erreicht.
languages.original_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

traits.locale_text: Diese Waffe war für Zeremonien der Ekklesiarchie gedacht. Sie hat ihren Empfänger nie erreicht.

languages.text: Cette arme était censée servir lors des cérémonies de l'Ecclésiarchie, mais elle n'a jamais atteint son destinataire.
languages.original_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme était censée servir lors des cérémonies de l'Ecclésiarchie, mais elle n'a jamais atteint son destinataire.

languages.text: Bu silah, Ekleşiarşi törenlerinde kullanılmak üzere üretilmiş ancak hedeflenen alıcısına asla ulaşamamış.
languages.original_text: This weapon was meant to be used in Ecclesiarchy ceremonies. It never reached its intended recipient.

traits.locale_text: Bu silah, Ekleşiarşi törenlerinde kullanılmak üzere üretilmiş ancak hedeflenen alıcısına asla ulaşamamış.
